title: Besting the Nation
author: VD
content_html: Space Bunny and I took the BBC’s Test the Nation quiz yesterday. Didn’t do too badly, beating everyone in the actual TV audience – the highest score there was 143 – although not as well as Emma Patterson of Wokengham. It was probably the most difficult test of this sort that I’ve ever taken thanks to the time limitations, but it was fun.
content_text:
Space Bunny and I took the BBC’s
Test the Nation
quiz yesterday.  Didn’t do too badly, beating everyone in the actual TV audience – the highest score there was 143 – although not as well as Emma Patterson of Wokengham.  It was probably the most difficult test of this sort that I’ve ever taken thanks to the time limitations, but it was fun.
